credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
title: Design for a Gold and Cabochon Gem Brooch
medium: Brush and gouache, gum varnish over graphite on tan wove paper.
description: Golden brooch in form of pendant. At top, green cabochon-cut gem supports gold chains off of which hang two more green stones, one cabochon-cut, the second, an ovoid shape. Four drop pearls appear through- out the design.
name: Drawing
